name: Landscape
description:
This is an ink painting I made in Summer 2021. In this period, I began to apply more shades of grey to my paintings, which were once dominated by bold and clear calligraphic lines.
In the world full of uncertainty, the lofty trees, even the massive rock, begin to disintegrate and reveal their true forms, Only the mind full of attachments still refuses to embrace the beauty of ephemerality.
